TRAINERS AND INSTRUCTORS

WE’RE CRAFTING
AN EXPERIENCE FOR YOU.
IT’S CALLED RushPRO.

STOP SPINNING YOUR WHEELS

BUILD A HEALTHY,
SUNSTAINABLE
PERSONAL TRAINING
BUSINESS, FASTER.

You’re starting out, or have been working with a local gym. You’ve
worked hard, invested the time, bent over backwards for your
clients but haven’t seen the business-side results you hoped for.

There’s a better way. Enter RushPRO by GymRush.

WHAT CAN RushPRO
DO FOR YOU?


The perfect combination. RushPro for Trainers and Instructors
resides within the GymRush app. It seamlessly works with
Trainees who have logged in with RushLIVE - the trainee-oriented
side of GymRush app. Trainees have 24/7 reporting, trainee
analytics, messaging, booking appointments and more. All in the
palm of your hand.

Connect and monitor your clients’ progress, 24/7.
Fractional commission fees compared to local gyms.
More control over your schedule.
Run your personal training business with your phone.
Everything in the cloud. All in one place.

TRAINEES

ACHIEVE YOUR FITNESS GOALS BY CONNECTING WITH A RUSHPRO TRAINER.

Are you an individual or group looking to improve your fitness? We’ve created an experience for you within GymRush app! It’s called RushLIVE, and we can’t wait to see what you do with it. Track your progress, connect with your RushPRO Trainer, and achieve your fitness goals with the ease and power of RushLIVE


Help build the future of GymRush app. Sign up for the RushPro app closed beta testing group now. On approval, you’ll have early access to new builds and features, and have the opportunity to share your input and shape the future of the RushPRO experience and GymRush app

WE’RE LOOKING FOR PERSONAL
TRAINERS TO PARTICIPATE IN THE
RushPRO BETA PROGRAM.

More information on the RushPRO Beta Program
